data.title: Official Trailer
data.meta_description:
Meet The Misfits in this action-packed trailer for the upcoming thriller movie starring Pierce Brosnan.

A band of modern-day Robin Hoods known as "The Misfits," recruits renowned thief Richard Pace (Pierce Brosnan) to help them pull off the heist of the century. The prize: millions in gold bars stashed underneath one of the world's most secure prisons.

The movie, directed by Renny Harlin (Die Hard 2: Die Harder), also stars Rami Jaber, Hermione Corfield, Jamie Chung, Mike Angelo, Tim Roth, and Nick Cannon.

The Misfits arrives in theaters on June 11, 2021, and will be available on Digital and on Demand on June 15, 2021.
